predicate.note: Frames file for 'feature' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The Machinists rejected a proposal featuring a 10% base wage increase over the life of the three-year contract, plus bonuses of 8% the first year and 3% the second.
example.arg: a 10% base wage increase over the life of the three-year contract, plus bonuses of 8% the first year and 3 %the second

example.name: with location argument
example.text: The characters will also be featured *trace* in a new public service effort for the United Way.
example.arg: a new public service effort for the United Way
